scripts.pretest: rimraf allure-results allure-report cypress/videos cypress/screenshots && mkdir allure-results
scripts.cy:open: npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/ui/test/**/** --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run: set DEBUG=allure-plugin* && npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/ui/test/**/* --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:cucumber:run: set DEBUG=allure-plugin* && npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/cucumber/*.feature,excludeSpecPattern=*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.allure:history: npm run allure:report && move allure-report\history allure-results\history && rimraf allure-report
scripts.posttest: npm run allure:report && allure open allure-report
